channel.title: Problems with my shops in my server
channel.description:
ok i am really good at coding and i put this stuff for the shop in the right place for client.java and do everything right in shop.cfg but when i got to talk to the npc to open the shop nothing happens or if u can trade the npc it lags u out
plz tell me how to fix this i hav had problems with this for ages

item.title: Problems with my shops in my server
item.dc:creator: @teric6 teric6
item.description:
@teric6 wrote:

Hmm, well, make sure you have added the wanneShop correctly, by that i mean exactly like the others, and say your wanneShop is 39, make sure your shop Id is correct, and make sure you haven’t added glitched items, and make sure you have used TABS instead of the space bar

Read full topic
item.source: Problems with my shops in my server

item.title: Problems with my shops in my server
item.dc:creator: @gho5t gho5t
item.description:
@gho5t wrote:

Yeah I have the same problem, I’ve tried EVERY tradeable NPC there is and every time I trade it lags me out… I heard if you move the NPC to the top of your NPC spawn list, it fixes it, but I’ve never had the time to try it.

Read full topic
